comment.author: 30369211@N00
comment._content: A short lived line. It only opened in 1910, and the section South to Castleblayney closed in 1923 after partition. The whole line closed in 1957.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: According to this source, the station opened on May 31, 1909 and closed on January 1, 1957. www.railbrit.co.uk/Ireland/Irish_railways.pdf www.railbrit.co.uk/Ireland/statement.htm
